name: Cumulative Expired Amount
description: Cumulative stock amount by expiration date of batch managed materials. For example, if 'Calendar' table is filtered to Jan 2023, this value is the expired amount of materials with expiration/SLED date on or before Jan 31, 2023.
This measure is best used with fields in the 'Calendar' table.
A material is batch managed if it is indicated so in the material master in SAP.
